thread.title: Curry nets 19 in Warriors' loss to Lakers in shortened game
thread.title_full: Curry nets 19 in Warriors' loss to Lakers in shortened game

title: Curry nets 19 in Warriors' loss to Lakers in shortened game
text:
> Top News Curry nets 19 in Warriors' loss to Lakers in shortened game Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry battles for a loose ball with Los Angeles Lakers forward Julius Randle in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in San Diego. (AP Photo/Lenny Ignelzi) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
